gear.name: Clothes
gear.desc: Appropriate to your duties as a bounty hunter.

gear.name: Gaming Set
gear.desc: One type of gaming set of your choice.

gear.name: Bright Red Fruit
gear.desc: A mysterious Feywild fruit, glowing faintly. Effects unknown.

gear.name: Wand of Dancing Lights
gear.desc: This wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 charge to cast the Dancing Lights cantrip. The wand regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.

gear.name: Wand of Smiles
gear.desc: This pink wand has 3 charges. As an action, you can expend 1 charge to create a silent, spectral, smiling mouth at a point you can see within 30 feet. The mouth disappears after 1 minute. The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

gear.name: Book of eight dirty jokes
gear.desc: A creature can read a joke to cast Vicious Mockery (spell save DC 13). Once a joke is read, it disappears from the book.
